full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSANG SPYOD SNYAN BRGYUD LAS DKAR 'GYED SOGS KYI DMIGS PA RNAMS NGAG DON DU BSGRIGS PA 'DZAD MED LUS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES GSANG SPYOD SNYAN RGYUD LAS DKAR 'GYED SOGS KYI DMIGS PA RNAMS NGAG 'DON DU BSGRIGS PA 'DZAD MED LUS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I RIN PO CHES SNYING GI BUM PA BZANG PO LEGS PAR GDAMS PA'I DGE BSHES DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA LDOG PAR ^CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYIS DMIGS RDZONG CHEN MO'I NANG BZHIN BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG RTA MGRIN NO, 'DIS SNYAN BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DON GRUB,
